column4: new to linux.... How can I add a "address bar" to my desktop panel????... Its a slow migration from windows. this is one feature I am truely frustrated not having... (amongst the 1000 other things I can NOT figure out) but am trying =)

In windows I was able to have an address bar docked on my start menu bar which allowed me to type in whatever web address and have it launched in (default web browser)... would like to have this ability on the panel (where my quick launch icons are)
Right click the panel, choose "add to panel"  see if there's something like that in there.
